business.name: Mega Agancy
business.description: We provide professional shopify store creation services with quality assurance and customer satisfaction guarantee.
business.working_hours: 24/7 AI Support, Human Support: 9 AM - 6 PM (Pakistan Time)
business.response_time: Instant AI response, Human response within 2 hours

services.name: Basic Package
services.description: Perfect for individuals and small projects. Includes essential features to get you started.

services.name: Standard Package
services.description: Most popular choice for growing businesses. Includes advanced features and priority support.

services.name: Premium Package
services.description: Complete solution for enterprises. Full features with dedicated support and unlimited revisions.

payment_methods.instructions: Send payment to this number and share screenshot here.
Send payment to this number and share screenshot here.
Transfer to this account and share receipt here.

advance_payment.note: Advance payment is required to confirm your order. Minimum Rs. 1,000 or 20% of total amount.

faqs.question: What is your refund policy?
faqs.answer: We offer a full refund if work has not started. Once work begins, refund terms depend on the progress made. Please discuss with our team for specific cases.

faqs.question: How long does delivery take?
faqs.answer: Delivery time depends on the package: Basic (3-5 days), Standard (5-7 days), Premium (7-10 days). Rush delivery may be available for additional charges.

faqs.question: Do you offer revisions?
faqs.answer: Yes! Basic package includes 1 revision, Standard includes 3 revisions, and Premium includes unlimited revisions.

faqs.question: How do I make payment?
faqs.answer: We accept JazzCash, EasyPaisa, and Bank Transfer. After selecting your package, you'll receive payment details. Send the advance amount and share the screenshot with us.

faqs.question: Can I see samples of your work?
faqs.answer: Yes! Please ask to speak with our team and they will share our portfolio with you.

faqs.question: Do you provide support after delivery?
faqs.answer: Yes! All packages include 7 days of free support after delivery. Extended support packages are also available.
